Решил вспомнить молодость, как я запускал халву на еще белом квадратном мониторе
Сейчас чисто что бы еще раз вспомнить предысторию персов со 2й халвы, пройду доп. еще раз, что бы вдруг не забыть что либо при прохождении 2й части :D
Good
Hello steam. this game is good. just one small problem. i cant turn my vew. same thing happens with oposing foce, only i can turn, but with a loy of foce needed. please fix.
Puede ser bastante corto, pero es muy entretenido.
We now need Half Life Otis

I want to like this, but i can't. Blue Shift (or bullshit in this case) doesn't add any new things and just recreates the story by another perspective. Get opposing force instead, why? Glad you asked. OF adds new stuff actually. New enemies, weapons and even new mechanics. OF and BS cost the same anyways.

A decent expansion to Half-Life that has you playing as the security guard, Barney Calhoun, found in the beginning of Half-Life 1. It's very short so I wouldn't recommend buying it for 5 bucks but if you got it from the Half-Life Complete or Valve Complete Pack Bundle (or even on sale) then you should definitely play it as it isn't that long, and it is classic Half-Life gameplay.
It's Blue Shift, what do you expect?

[h1] Да. [/h1]
Эта игра для любителей Халф Лайфа, но с более менее понятным сюжетом. Довольно интересная игра, много приятных моментов в прохождении, но из-за особенностей сюжета недоступно многое оружие из обычного хл.
[u] (если у вас появляется проблема с мышью, то в настройках включите raw mouse input) [/u]

[spoiler] По камерам Чёрной Мезы можно увидеть какая скотина этот ваш Гордон Фримен, здороваться с учёными его не учили =) [/spoiler]
Güzel bir oyun  oynanabilir

Blue Shift is one of those games that you get as part of a bundle and instead of being a basic kinda bad extra, it turns out to be something you love. Though its campaign isn't anything as big as the original game or OpFor, Blue Shift is more classic Half Life and as such is still fun to play and well designed (though guiding Rosenberg isn't). Id suggest it if you want more classic Half Life, but buy Opposing Force first.
Fun addition to the original Half-Life. Definitely more of a DLC type addition as the game itself takes 2-3 hours to complete. Still holds up all these years later.
Hop on Blue Shift Remote Play?
Not as good as Opposing Force, and it was very short.  I completed it in only 4 hours.  However it was entertaining and I still recommend it.
half-life diet version with some neat parts
good enough
great just great
A bit short but a great game!

[h1] Half-Life: Blue Shift - игра где мы играем за Барни Калхуна [/h1]
• Игра в лице другого человека в которой мы играем от лица Барни Калхуна, который в день "каскадного резонанса" вышел на работу охранника. В этом дополнении очень мало так такового боевика, мы лишь играем за охранника который выполняет свою работу и по уставу в комплексе спасает жизни ученных, помогая им выбраться из комплекса. 
• Игра нам показывает то, что действия Барни не являются значимыми в событиях игры и это значит что он не интересен G-Man'у и его работодателям как тот же самый [u]Фримен[/u] и [u]Шеппард[/u]. Дополнение достойное, но слишком уж короткое, мое время прохождение составило всего лишь [u]2 часа с хвостиком[/u].
Always fun to play.
A very fun expansion pack. It is short, yes, but it has some amazing level design and a really enjoyable story. If you love the original Half-Life and want more, this is the perfect expansion pack.
Качок-охранник рвёт задницу с двумя стариками, залез очкарику в портал смотреть бесплатно без смс

A nice lesson in games history. For Germans this game also offers a retrospective of late 90s games censorship in Germany, as the game is ridiclulously cut, but at least also the German version works (unlike with Opposing Force, where the German version has some excruciating bugs and inferior AI behaviour).
коротко но интересно. эта часть больше понравилась чем opposing force. крутое дополнение.

The only complaint is the short runtime of this expansion. It's another good expansion of the original game, and the choice to switch out protagonists I think is a compelling way to tell a multi-faceted story. As simple as the Half-Life story is, the way the narrative is delivered is unforgettable. As I have heard other commentators say, I must agree, newcomers ought to play Half-Life, HL: Blue Shift, and then HL: Opposing Force, not in release order.
Recommended for fans of Half-Life 1. If you liked that, here's more of it. And with Barney!
it gud
Круто!

This feels like more of the same way more than Opposing Force did. However this game is much shorter. Like Opposing Force, it was fun seeing the story here interact with Gordon's, although it happened much less. Worth the time and money.

Dalo by se říci, že se jedná o hrozné rozšíření. Jediné, co totiž hra nabízí nového, je příběh, a to ani ne tak důležitý. Zbraně i nepřátelé zůstávají stejné jako v původním Half-Life, což je možná trochu promarněná příležitost.
Doporučuji, protože jádro HF1 je dobré, ale nečekejte nic nového. Pokud chcete více HF, tak je to přesně ono.
Taková pohodová hra na jedno odpoledne. Dohráno za 2,5 hoďky na střední obtížnost s minimem smrtí.

tiene una historia interesante que nos deja volver a lugares como el mundo XEN y nos muestra lo grande que son las bases de Black Mesa

No dura mucho, tiene una historia corta pero recuerden que es una expansion 
No tiene ni variedad de armas ni enemigos (Son los mismos de la version base)
Me baja los FPS (no se si a alguno le habra pasado)
Y en general BUENA expansion Tiene sus altos y bajos pero muy buena 9/10 Por uno que otro fallo

Güzel

I played the game on hard, and it is clear that nobody understood how to make a game "harder". An extremely low amount of health, ammo, and armor pickups; vortigaunts constantly spawning with no cover to hide behind; and armor having little no no effect when you are hit are some things that make the game problematic. There is also a lack of actual dialogue after the first ten or so minutes, causing the game to feel boring. the levels have little to no character and had puzzles which were long and straightforward with a lack of challenging puzzles. Overall. this game blends very well in the lore, with Gordon visible on cameras during the first part of the game, and marines making remarks about Adrian Shepherd. 6/10
very good game

The second expansion for Half-Life, I found this to be more enjoyable than the first expansion "Opposing Force". It was a lot shorter and less difficult while still being enjoyable. If you need more Half-Life in your life, this is a good choice.

Very fun, not as good as Opposing Forces and definitely not as good as Half Life, but still quite fun. Although still short.  If you like Half-Life definitely get this if you have money to spare.

Liked it. Play as Barney escaping from Black Mesa immediately after Gordon fudges up the Earth as a whole

My old review was a thumbs down. The things like bugs, rather challenging levels, ect.. put me off Blue Shift for awhile. But after I finished Opposing Force (which I still do recommend over Blue Shift, though for different reasons) and was craving some new Half-Life gameplay. I picked up Blue Shift again, and discovered that I really enjoyed the game. The glitches are avoidable, and I found that the challenging levels are really not as challenging as I remember, though still fun. As a bonus, the music is BOPPIN'.
Great for some original Half-Life nostalgia...hearing some of the original voices was cool. It's really amazing how far games have come in the last 20 years!

While not as good as Opposing Force and a very short, Blue shift is still a fun game. Nothing new introduced in this one but the new perspective of familiar events is interesting.
Es mas o menos

Blue Shift tells the story of Black Mesa from the Barney perspective, and it's pretty solid and funny.
So the question is: what were Barney the guard doing while Gordon Freeman was trying to save the human race? This game is the answer.
Same graphic engine as Half-Life original game, a good expansion, very cheap but reasonably long. It just goes a bit boring after a couple of hours, but nothing too severe.
It's recommended also because it's the "other part" of the story, and no one wants a 50% told story.

Pros:

+ Same engine as HL
+ Funny and reasonably short
+ Charismatic
+ Cheap
+ Nice story...

Cons:

- ...But not so intense as the original game
- It gets a bit boring after a couple of hours

This DLC is too cheap to be neglected, and complete another part of the story from another point of view, so i recommend it.
Short and sweet.

yo no entiendo porque blue shift no es tan bien recibido como opposing force. Digo esto porque creo que blue shift es mas justo y tiene un poco mas de sentido con respecto a opposing force ya que en este shepard avanza sin realmente saber a donde solo donde le guia el camino mientras que en este...
HISTORIA
...Barney, el protagonista de este juego avanza con un poco mas de sentido que es encontrar al doctor Rosenberg que le ayudara a escapar de Black Mesa donde iremos combatiendo soldados y alienigenas Xen lo cual me lleva a esto que es un problema, en el Half Life original los policias no duraban nada y tenian muy poca punteria pero este NO, porque, bueno no se sabe tenemos que suponer que Barney es el policia elegido o algo asi pero...ña no importa.
GAMEPLAY
Bueno te la resumo ya que es como en mis otras reseñas: Es igual de buena que el de Half Life y Opposing Force (y en parte del 2).
DIFICULTAD
Es muy buena comparada con la de Opposing Force que esa era injusta en tema de recursos, esta es mucho mejor en tema de recursos el unico tema es que compara con Opposing Force esta no cambia nada ya que no tiene ni nuevas armas ni nuevos villanos pero es divertido, eso si no es tan buena comparada con Half Life y su secuela.
CONCLUSION 
Half Life Blue Shift considero que (talvez) sea la mejor expansion de todas ya que aca tenes un objetivo y no es tan injusta como Opposing Force, si tiene errores como bugs y que hay momentos en los que como Opposing Force es injusto.
 Pero este tiene una buena historia y te la recomiendo completamente, a cierto le quita puntos el error del mouse pero ya explique como arreglarlo en mi reseña de Opposing Force y aparte este juego no revoluciono tanto como Opposing Force en tema de armas y enemigos.
CALIFICACION


Half Life Blue Shift: 8
Half-Life 'tan daha çok eğlendim.Kısa ve güzel bir oyundu.

Наконец то появился внятный сюжет. Локации стали заполнены более детальней, но от того куда идти и что нужно это не спасает. Но таких ситуаций мало, т.к игра короткая и это +. Геймплей тот же, только появился некий баланс на сложном уровне. Теперь в месте, где будет бойня всегда есть патроны и аптечки. Графика чуть лучше первой части, нормальная. 6/10
is good beter than half life source

Ну что сказать, на этот раз игра от лица не главных героев, а простого работяги и таких же бедолаг как он, оставленных умирать в этой лаборатории. Из минус выделяется то ,что оно короткое (часов 6-7 всего) и головоломки , отвлекающие от прохождения игры. Для себя я заметил что Джимэн и твари зэна не сильно заинтересованны Барни, словно плказывая его второстепенность. 
Итог: как адд-он игра очень хороша, на 2 -3 вечера неспешного прохождения можно насладиться. 
P.s. некоторые говорят что ценник в 133 рубля жля маленького адд-она это многовато( с чем я всеже соглашусь) , но по скидке игра самое то.
